content: **this pattern is a freebie and it will remain so enjoy if you like my patterns i will be very happy if you add me to your friends and follow me on instagram @comfortzoneknits 2 ** november is a classic ribbed hat with a little twist fancy cables are easy and fun to knit you won t get bored while knitting this hat you can make the hat shorter or longer with folded or classic brim it is just up to you the hat is knitted in the rounds from bottom up *note the pattern includes only written instructions this pattern has not been tested so i will be very grateful if you let me know about any miskates you find * **sizes** 1 2 1 adult small to fit 54 cm / 21 5 head circumference 2 adult large to fit 58 cm / 23 25 head circumference length with folded brim 23 cm / 9 25 **yarn** for a hat you ll need about 180 200 m / 197 219 of any dk weight yarn sample was made with organic dk 7oczek 100% south american merino 225m / 246y per 100g in true blood colorway *note that the yardage is estimated * **needles** 3 75 mm us #5 circular needles for magic-loop or dpns or size needed to get the right gauge 3 0 mm us #2 ½ circular needles for magic-loop or dpns or three sizes smaller than the gauge needles **additional materials** 1 stitch marker cable needle tapestry needle for weaving ends **gauge** 28 sts and 36 rounds = 10x10 cm / 4x4 - in 1x1 rib pattern worked in the round with 3 0 mm us #2 ½ needles after wet blocking 26 sts and 34 rounds = 10x10 cm / 4x4 - in texture pattern worked in the round with 3 75 mm us #5 needles after wet blocking *adjust needle size if necessary to get given gauge * **errata ** cdd - cetral double decrease - slip 2 sts knitwise both at the same time k1 p2sso p2sso - pass 2 slipped stitches over the knit stitch 1 https //payhip com/b/pz8yj 2 https //www instagram com/comfortzoneknits/
